attributes.action: do the decent thing and resign.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent debacle over expenses and the way that GB has managed the situation within his own party is poor to say the least.
He is an unelected leader and is increasingly in a difficult situation. Given the lack of confidence in his leadership and his party he should resign.

With the current economic climate this country needs efficient, professional leadership and recognition from the leaders that the voters are having to tighten their belts considerably due to the recession and that we do not have time for MPs who manage to claim expenses for luxury items and in some cases, allegedly fraudulent claims.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
